fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Education and training, Environment, Trans-European Networks
eu_initiatives:
The Foundation is responsible for the LEADER programme (2014-2020). The Foundation will be issuing a number of action as part of the South east local development strategy. GAL Xlokk is a member of the Rural Networks' Assembly, with SG Code: EO3277. 
 
The GAL XLOKK Foundation is one of the Local Action Groups which have been chosen to implement the LEADER programme for Malta (2014-2020) in the Xlokk territory. The aim of the Foundation is to help improve the quality of life and economic prosperity in the South-East rural areas in Malta. Seventeen (17) Rural localities fall under the Xlokk territory. These are situated along the south coast and extend from west to east and to the centre of the island. Although one can say that many planning issues are common to the whole island, the Xlokk territory has a number of specific features/ needs which need to be reflected into different targeted measures.
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Rural Network's Assembly#E03277#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3277#Member#C#Leader and Community-Led Local Development
relevant_communication:
The Foundation is responsible for the EU LEADER programme in south-east territory of Malta for the period 2014-2020. After a public consultation, a local development strategy was approved by the local Managing Authority. The local action group will be issuing 5 measures for various beneficiaries including local councils, environmental voluntary organisations, cultural organisations and natural persons. More details can be found in the below link: 
 
http://galxlokk.com/category/documents/
goals__remit: THE GAL XLOKK Foundation is one of the three local action groups in Malta. It is responsible for the LEADER programme (2014-2020) as part of the South east Local development strategy in the Maltese Islands.
